list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove GitHub Classroom autograding configuration
Deleted autograding setup files (`autograding.json` and `github-classroom.yml`) to reflect a transition away from GitHub Classroom workflows. Simplified ChromeDriver setup in tests by eliminating unnecessary arguments, improving readability and maintainability.

task.summary:
Update .idea settings and TestNG configurations
Refactored IntelliJ project settings, including GitHub and Git preferences. Added a new TestNG configuration for `abTestingPageHasSpecificTextTest` and updated relevant metadata. Minor update to the timestamp in the README.

Add GitHub autograding and upgrade project dependencies
Implemented GitHub Classroom autograding configuration with Selenium tests. Upgraded Java version to 17, updated Maven dependencies, and adjusted IntelliJ project settings. Improved test setup and streamlined project structure for compatibility and maintainability.

Enhance project with GitHub autograding and dependency updates
Implemented GitHub Classroom autograding with Selenium tests and updated project to Java 17. Refined Maven dependencies and adjusted IntelliJ project settings for better compatibility and maintainability. Streamlined test setup and overall project structure.

Update IntelliJ settings and GitHub autograding config
Refined IntelliJ project settings, including TestNG configurations and metadata for improved compatibility. Adjusted GitHub Classroom autograding workflow and streamlined MAVEN_OPTS for better execution. Minor fixes to settings and task management for enhanced maintainability.

Update IntelliJ settings and enhance ChromeDriver setup
Refined IntelliJ project settings and GitHub autograding workflows for better compatibility. Added ChromeOptions configuration to improve stability and enable headless mode for GitHub Actions. Minor adjustments improve maintainability and execution consistency.

Update IntelliJ settings and improve ChromeDriver setup
Refined IntelliJ project settings and GitHub autograding workflows for enhanced compatibility. Improved stability by configuring ChromeOptions to enable headless mode for GitHub Actions. Removed unnecessary Chrome user data directory argument and made minor adjustments for better maintainability.

Add unique user data directory for Chrome in tests
This ensures each test run uses a separate Chrome user data directory, preventing conflicts. The directory name is suffixed with the current timestamp for uniqueness. This change improves test stability and avoids potential data sharing issues.

Remove GitHub Classroom autograding configuration
This commit deletes the autograding setup files, including the `autograding.json` and associated GitHub Actions workflow (`github-classroom.yml`). These changes likely indicate a shift away from automated grading or a migration to a different tooling setup.

Remove GitHub Classroom autograding configuration
Deleted autograding setup files (`autograding.json` and `github-classroom.yml`) to reflect a transition away from GitHub Classroom workflows. Simplified ChromeDriver setup in tests by eliminating unnecessary arguments, improving readability and maintainability.
